"Well," Wheeljack-X says, "lead on, folks.  You know this place and I 
don't, so ..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> Nightlight replied "well I think that we should leave this place... 
> predacons are near and something tell me that they won't be happy 
> when they ends their current battle"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Wheeljack-X::
> > 
> > "Yeah, there was," Jackie responds.  "Blown away in the Third 
> > Cybertronian War.  I do pretty much the same sort of things.  
> General 
> > surgeon and Mr. Fix-it, that's me.  A little bit on the loopy 
side, 
> > according to performance reviews."  He laughs.
> >

> > > named Wheeljack?"
